name: Elder Dragon
description: Increases your Health Recovery by 5% for each Draconic Power ability slotted.  Current bonus: 0%.  Increases range of your melee attacks by 2 meters. This effect only applies to instant cast attacks with a 5 meter range.
coefDescription: Increases your Health Recovery by 5% for each Draconic Power ability slotted.  Current bonus: $1%.  Increases range of your melee attacks by 2 meters. This effect only applies to instant cast attacks with a 5 meter range.
